BREAST-COMPOSITION: The breast tissue in this mammogram image appears to be heterogeneously dense.
FINDINGS: There is a round, well-circumscribed opacity with regular margins and a possible calcification present in the upper outer quadrant of the left breast. This finding suggests a benign lesion such as a fibroadenoma or a benign calcification. However, due to its location and size, short-term follow-up is recommended to confirm stability.
